text: Located inside Esso Toa Payoh Fairprice Xpress, they have also have rice bowl meals and salads aside from the obvious maki. Staff is helpful and do their best but it's no fast food, so expect to wait a bit if there is someone ahead.

I ordered mega san but they miss out on my turkey bacon bits. This is not the first time they mess up my order, previously they when i ordered mega san, they almost miss out on my smoked duck, it was after my reminder, then they open up the sushi and added it. What disappointed me this time is that i think they do realise they miss out my turkey bacon bits as the worker was looking to see if i notice their mistake but they just went ahead and cut the sushi. I hope they will check their order carefully before rolling the sushi next time.
